comment: Dr. Barton made this course an enjoyable and encouraging space. Her weekly videos were the most helpful resource, offering step-by-step instructions and motivational words that helped me complete assignments with clarity and confidence. The assignments were also engaging, which motivated me to put genuine effort into my research and writing.

This prof's guideline for assignments are not always the clearest because there is not always a rubric available to understand the assignment and the assignments tend to be a lot of work. However, she does allow students to redo assignments, and provides good feedback. She is generally good at responding at emails however do not email on Fridays.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: If you are looking for an easy class, this is not it. There are a lot of readings and homework, and the assignments are very lengthy. She gave good feedback, and there were extra credit opportunities, but the workload was too much, so I wouldn't recommend it.

There is a ton of reading. That's my only complaint. But the reading was interesting because all of it surrounded true crime or podcasts. But what made me give Dr. Barton such high marks is how she made it easy with weekly videos, examples, & rubrics that explained what was expected. And when I emailed, she responded with guidance & grace.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures --Gives good feedback

comment: I have never met a professor that cared so much. I'm an online student and I ofthen have difficulty even reaching a professor. Sometimes I wonder if they are bots. Not Dr. Barton, though. Each week she made these weekly lecture video breaking down and guiding us through D2L Brightspace and what we were expected to do. So helpful.

Wow! If you need to take 1102 ... TAKE HER CLASS. She provides lots of helpful feedback and answers email questions so quickly. I suck at writing. I was worried. But she helped me and she even checked in to make sure I was okay when I had a life emergency.  You won't find a better professor.

I liked Dr. Barton, she gave really good feedback and since we were in group projects you have help from classmates. There are presentations but they aren't bad because we presented about our books which were really interesting. The hardest assingment in this class in portfolio 1, but after that its a breeze.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Online Savvy

comment: Not only is this professor one that understands we have a lot going on beyond this class, she goes the extra step and emails us about our progress so that we are always aware of how we are doing. The D2L course she has gives us all the information we need to make sure we stay on track in a hybrid course.

This is my second time taking Dr. Barton's class. I took 1101 last semester and had such a great experience that I took her for 1102. While she is tough, she is fair and supportive. When I messed up, I went to her and she gave me an extension on the missing work. Most professors won't do that. TAKE HER CLASS!

This class was scary at first. There were three portfolios and a lot of textbook work. But I found the textbook exercises were the paper drafts & we were actually working on the portfolios.  I just submitted my last assignment & I hope it brings me to a B. BTW, she constantly emailed me about my progress and offered support. Above and beyond.

I struggled a lot this semester with my mental health. I even tried to drop the class because the work felt overwhelming. I was so surprised that she worked with me to get caught up. She was patient through all my emailed questions.I have never in my life met a more caring and kind teacher. Others that say she was unreachable are wrong!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: terrible teacher this was the worst english class ive ever taken. do NOT reccomend
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--So many papers

comment: Heather Barton is the single most difficult person to reach outside of class. I try to email her and she takes days to reply to a simple question. I try to schedule an online meeting and she postpones it for weeks. What's worse: the class is online. If you plan to take Barton's class, be prepared to fly solo--she will NOT help.
rating_tags: Group projects--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: She was super cool. But just a heads up, she teaches hybrid which was tough to figure out in my first semester. Barely passed but she was so funny and I actually learned some really interesting things from her. Wish she taught 100% in-person classes but great teacher fs.

TAKE THIS CLASS! She's amazing, caring, and funny. The only professor I've had that took into account the times we're in. Assignments are fun because you're given creative freedom. Generous grader, I got 100's on every assignment except one.  And she understands about life and will work with you. Take this class!!!!!! It's fun and not a burden!
